snippet: More than 500 refugees were blocked after taking an unlikely route toward Europe, hoping to bypass unfriendly border guards, barbed-wire fences and cluttered camps.
abstract: Group of over 500 migrants are stranded in Nikel, Russia, due to issues crossing into Norway; refugees from Syria and other countries were trying to reach Europe through Moscow, avoiding congested route through central Europe.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: More than 500 refugees were blocked after taking an unlikely route toward Europe, hoping to bypass unfriendly border guards, barbed-wire fences and cluttered camps.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Russia: Migrants Stranded in Far North
headline.main: Migrants Taking Arctic Path to Norway Are Stranded in Russia
